urn:Campaign.urn:Name: 201819_Enrolment_Chase_Nursing
urn:Campaign.urn:Description: Student Enrolment Chase, Nursing Placements for 201718.
urn:Campaign.urn:StatedGoal: Increase in student enrolment and decreased administration overheads

urn:ContextParameter.urn:Name: v_ProgramCategory
urn:ContextParameter.urn:Description: Category of Students Programme (P, N or O)

urn:Transition.urn:GuardConditionRule: v_ESTS_Code = "EL" and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_ProgramCategory = "N"

(v_ESTS_Code = "AA" or v_ESTS_Code = "EN" or v_ESTS_Code = "EX" or v_ESTS_Code = "NR" or v_ESTS_Code = "PA" or v_ESTS_Code = "PN" or v_ESTS_Code = "RA" or v_ESTS_Code = "RN" or v_ESTS_Code = "SB" or v_ESTS_Code = "WU" or v_ESTS_Code = "YA" or v_ESTS_Code = "EE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PE" or v_ESTS_Code = "RE" or v_ESTS_Code = "YE" ) and v_Deceased = "N" and v_STST_Code = "AS"
v_Deceased = "N" and (v_ESTS_Code = "WD" or v_ESTS_Code = "NS" or v_ESTS_Code = "SS" or v_ESTS_Code = "SU" or v_ESTS_Code = "LH") or v_STST_Code <> "AS"
v_ESTS_Code = "EL" and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_ProgramCategory = "N"
v_Deceased = "N" and (v_ESTS_Code = "WD" or v_ESTS_Code = "NS" or v_ESTS_Code = "SS" or v_ESTS_Code = "SU" or v_ESTS_Code = "LH") or v_STST_Code <> "AS"

(v_ESTS_Code = "AA" or v_ESTS_Code = "EN" or v_ESTS_Code = "EX" or v_ESTS_Code = "NR" or v_ESTS_Code = "PA" or v_ESTS_Code = "PN" or v_ESTS_Code = "RA" or v_ESTS_Code = "RN" or v_ESTS_Code = "SB" or v_ESTS_Code = "WU" or v_ESTS_Code = "YA" or v_ESTS_Code = "EE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PE" or v_ESTS_Code = "RE" or v_ESTS_Code = "YE" ) and v_Deceased = "N" and v_STST_Code = "AS"
v_ESTS_Code = "EL" and v_STST_Code = "AS" and v_Deceased = "N" and v_ProgramCategory = "N"

(v_ESTS_Code = "AA" or v_ESTS_Code = "EN" or v_ESTS_Code = "EX" or v_ESTS_Code = "NR" or v_ESTS_Code = "PA" or v_ESTS_Code = "PN" or v_ESTS_Code = "RA" or v_ESTS_Code = "RN" or v_ESTS_Code = "SB" or v_ESTS_Code = "WU" or v_ESTS_Code = "YA" or v_ESTS_Code = "EE" or v_ESTS_Code = "PE" or v_ESTS_Code = "RE" or v_ESTS_Code = "YE" ) and v_Deceased = "N" and v_STST_Code = "AS"
v_Deceased = "N" and (v_ESTS_Code = "WD" or v_ESTS_Code = "NS" or v_ESTS_Code = "SS" or v_ESTS_Code = "SU" or v_ESTS_Code = "LH") or v_STST_Code <> "AS"

urn:ExpressionDefinition.urn:XmlExpression: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><Expression xmlns="urn:com.sungardhe.common.services.selection.querygenerator"><DatabaseColumnName>SPRIDEN_PIDM</DatabaseColumnName><DatabaseLocationName>Student</DatabaseLocationName><DataType>number</DataType><Subquery><Statement>SELECT spriden_pidm FROM spriden, sgbstdn, sfbetrm WHERE SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PIDM = SFBETRM.SFBETRM_PIDM AND SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF = SFBETRM.SFBETRM_TERM_CODE AND SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_PIDM = SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM AND SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_ADMIT < SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF AND spriden.spriden_change_ind IS NULL AND SFBETRM.SFBETRM_ESTS_CODE = 'EL' AND SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_STST_CODE = 'AS' AND DECODE (sgbstdn_term_code_grad, sgbstdn_term_code_eff, 'Y', 'N') = 'Y' AND sgbstdn_program_1 IN (SELECT gtvsdax_external_code FROM gtvsdax WHERE gtvsdax_internal_code_group = 'BRM' AND gtvsdax_internal_code = 'NURSING') AND SGBSTDN.SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF = :1 AND EXISTS (SELECT 'true' FROM goremal WHERE GOREMAL_PIDM = SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM AND GOREMAL_STATUS_IND = 'A' AND GOREMAL_PREFERRED_IND = 'Y') AND EXISTS (SELECT 'true' FROM spbpers WHERE SPBPERS.SPBPERS_PIDM = SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM AND NVL (SPBPERS.SPBPERS_DEAD_IND, 'N') != 'Y') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'true' FROM SPRHOLD WHERE SPRHOLD_PIDM = SPRIDEN.SPRIDEN_PIDM AND SPRHOLD_HLDD_CODE = 'FQ' AND ( SYSDATE >= SPRHOLD_FROM_DATE AND SYSDATE <= SPRHOLD_TO_DATE) )</Statement><Bindings><Timestamp>0</Timestamp><Size>1</Size><Binding><Id>1</Id><BindingName>Registration Term</BindingName><Description>Registration Term</Description><DataType>string</DataType><DataSource>literal</DataSource><Value>201819</Value><Property><Name>groupId</Name><Value>A592D57B-DC2D-16AF-E079-83590E32FE63</Value></Property><Property><Name>groupType</Name><Value>is</Value></Property></Binding></Bindings></Subquery></Expression>

urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Subject: University of Southampton - Enrolment Chase
urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Content:
Time to Enrol

Hello |::=Constituent.Name Information.FirstName::|,

Your Student ID number |::=Constituent.Identifiers.Banner ID::|
Programme: |::=Curricula.Student Program of Study.Primary Major Description(Term="201718")::|

Please enrol now for the 2018/19 academic year to ensure that you are able to access all of the resources you need to continue your studies.

Despite several reminders our records show that you have still not enrolled for the current academic year.

Are you experiencing problems with the process? Please call our Enrolment Hotline on +44(0)23 8059 8888 or email us at enrol@soton.ac.uk as soon as possible.

Are you a Tier 4 visa student studying in the UK? You are expected to abide by UK Visas and Immigration regulations which require all Tier 4 students to enrol on their programme of study. Failure to do so may result in the University removing sponsorship.

Enrol Now

 

  Do not respond to this email but send any queries to enrol@soton.ac.uk.

 
 
Courses        University life        Research        Business       Global connections
 
Connect with us
       
 
University of Southampton
SO17 1BJ United Kingdom
All Rights Reserved 2017
enrol@southampton.ac.uk
Tel: +44 (0)23 8059 8888

urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Subject: University of Southampton - Enrolment Chase
urn:EmailTemplate.urn:Content:
Deemed Withdrawn

Dear |::=Constituent.Name Information.FirstName::|,

Your Student ID number |::=Constituent.Identifiers.Banner ID::|
Programme: |::=Curricula.Student Program of Study.Primary Major Description(Term="201718")::|

Despite a number of weekly reminders, our records indicate that you have not enrolled for the current Academic Session.

 

Under the terms of the University’s Enrolment Policy all students are required to enrol for every year of academic study. If you are not enrolled, you are not entitled to receive tuition or use any of the University’s facilities.

As a result of your continued failure to enrol, you have been Deemed Withdrawn from the University and removed from active candidature.

The University is required to tell UK Visas and Immigration if any students holding a Tier 4 visa to study at the University of Southampton do not enrol before the end of the enrolment period. Therefore, if you have a Tier 4 visa to study at the University of Southampton we have today removed sponsorship and informed UK Visas and Immigration who will cancel your visa.

We very much regret this decision, but you have been given every opportunity to enrol for the current Academic Session.

Your Faculty have also been informed, and we would expect you to take no further advantage of any University facilities (academic or non-academic).


We wish you every success for your future.

Please do not respond to this email but send any queries to enrol@soton.ac.uk.


 
 
Courses        University life        Research        Business       Global connections
 
Connect with us
       
 
University of Southampton
SO17 1BJ United Kingdom
All Rights Reserved 2017
enrol@southampton.ac.uk
Tel: +44 (0)23 8059 8888

urn:Rule.urn:Name: Get_STST_code
urn:Rule.urn:Description: Returns STST code, accepts pipdm, term code

urn:RuleStatement.urn:Content: select SGBSTDN_STST_CODE from SGBSTDN where SGBSTDN_PIDM = ? and SGBSTDN_TERM_CODE_EFF = ?

urn:Rule.urn:Name: IsDeceased
urn:Rule.urn:Description: Checks if person is deceased - returns Y or N

urn:RuleStatement.urn:Content: select nvl(max('Y'),'N') from SPBPERS where SPBPERS_PIDM = ? and (SPBPERS_DEAD_IND = 'Y')

urn:Rule.urn:Name: GetProgramCategory_V2
urn:Rule.urn:Description: GTVSDAX lookup returns ?P? Presessional or EAP, ?N? Nursing final_yr, else ?O? Other.

urn:RuleStatement.urn:Content: select case when sgbstdn_program_1 in (select gtvsdax_external_code from gtvsdax where gtvsdax_internal_code_group = 'PRSESS_CRS_CODE' and gtvsdax_internal_code = 'PRSESS_CRS' ) then 'P' when sgbstdn_program_1 in (select gtvsdax_external_code from gtvsdax where gtvsdax_internal_code_group = 'BRM' and gtvsdax_internal_code = 'NURSING' and decode(sgbstdn_term_code_grad, sgbstdn_term_code_eff, 'Y', 'N') = 'Y' ) then 'N' else 'O' end as ProgramCategory from sgbstdn where sgbstdn_pidm = ? and sgbstdn_term_code_eff = ?

urn:Rule.urn:Name: GetEnrolmentStatus
urn:Rule.urn:Description: Get the Enrolment Status for a prospect for a given term.

urn:RuleStatement.urn:Content: select sfbetrm_ests_code from sfbetrm where sfbetrm_pidm = ? and sfbetrm_term_code = ?

urn:Role.urn:Name: Admin
urn:Role.urn:Description: Allows access to all functionality and administrative objects
